attributes.action: India to be added to red list for travel
attributes.additional_details: India needs to be added to the red list. The increased amounts of cases in India coupled with the fact that many British Indians are travelling to India and returning back to the UK, increasing the chances of bringing different COVID variants in the country. India needs to be added to the red list to ensure public safety.
attributes.background: The combined new cases of COVID in Pakistan, Kenya, Bangladesh and Philippines is approx 25000 today. The new cases in in India today are approx 90000. India needs to be added to the red list.
